title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year

Inflation rate compared to previous year is rapidly decreasing from 1984 to 1986, rapidly increasing from 1986 to 1987, rapidly decreasing from 1987 to 1988, rapidly increasing from 1988 to 1989, roughly constant from 1989 to 1990, gradually increasing from 1990 to 1991, roughly constant from 1991 to 1992, slightly decreasing from 1992 to 1993, roughly constant from 1993 to 1996, slightly decreasing from 1996 to 1997, rapidly increasing from 1997 to 1998, rapidly decreasing from 1998 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2001, slightly decreasing from 2001 to 2003, rapidly increasing from 2003 to 2005, roughly constant from 2005 to 2006, gradually decreasing from 2006 to 2007, rapidly increasing from 2007 to 2008, rapidly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, gradually decreasing from 2011 to 2012, rapidly increasing from 2012 to 2014, gradually decreasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, rapidly increasing from 2016 to 2017, rapidly decreasing from 2017 to 2018, roughly constant from 2018 to 2019, rapidly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 5.43 was recorded at Year 2008
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.29 was recorded at Year 1988
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2018 to 2024.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2012 to 2018.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2007 to 2012.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2002 to 2007.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 1997 to 2002.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1992 to 1997.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 1987 to 1992.
